divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband and I were heading east bound on N.W. 50th street by car. I noticed something that sounded like a flare being fired and looked up. The object I saw was blue and orange and was moving extremely fast but was at the same distance from me as a plane would be, I first thought it was a meteor until it stopped completely and then made a turn to the south. I was shocked, I am typically pretty skeptical of things like this, and wanted to disprove it in my mind, but I was unable to when it moved the way it did, I have never seen anything quite like it. I was shocked by it, and my husband just looked at me and said, I told you so, haha. I didn't see it again all morning even though I was out driving. I was able to prove it wasn't a meteor shower as we drove out to the country and were unable to see anything at all the resembled a meteor.
